title: Black loading screen
body: Ranked game was starting up and suddenly there was a completely black loading screen instead of the usual showing the 10 champions, when trying to load into the game there are no prompts just a completely black screen and when clicking with mouse it shows white flashes. This forced a remake for my team and I tried to do this in a custom game but the same error occurred with the black screen.

replies.body: Cases like this can be due to your hardware having issues rendering the game.  Our [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) article has a series of steps you can take to resolve this.  Doing this in a custom game is a great call until it gets fixed up.  Hope that helps!
